text:
For stand-alone ~TiddlyWiki, drag and drop the following plugin into your ~TiddlyWiki file:

<<<
$:/plugins/MAS/NotoWritey
<<<

For node.js, you can find the plugin files at:

<<<
https://github.com/Marxsal/NotoWritey/tree/master/plugins/NotoWritey
<<<

Also, for node.js, a patch is needed to allow multiple-line files to be stored correctly without corrupting your NW document. Drag,  drop and import these tiddlers into your TW file:

* $:/core/modules/utils/filesystem.js
* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/filesystem/filesystemadaptor.js
* $:/config/FileSystemExtensions

Hopefully at some point the core files will be patched and these modifications won't be needed. 

Some of the discussion regarding these changes can be found [[here|https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/pull/4630]]
